item.title: Let's meet, on time!
item.description: The other day I read the great “Two Simple Secrets to Starting Every Meeting on Time”. Here @sabinanawaz presents two simple rules on “how to save time in meetings and be even more productive”: Meet for 45 minutes instead of an hour. Start meetings at quarter past the hour. One could say I’ve used the first rule for quite some time, but the meetings were set for 50 minutes.
